RelatedSentence: WASHINGTON , May 19 ( UPI ) -- A federal judge ruled Friday against the District of Columbia 's budget autonomy charter amendment , through which the city council had attempted to wrest control over budget approval from congressional oversight .

WASHINGTON , May 19 ( UPI ) -- A federal judge ruled Friday against the District of Columbia 's budget autonomy charter amendment , through which the city council had attempted to wrest control over budget approval from congressional oversight .
